## Diagnostic psychometrics with R

The r-dcm suite is a collection of packages for estimating and evaluating diagnostic classification models in [*R*](https://r-project.org) using [tidyverse](https://tidyverse.org) principles.

What do you need to know to start using the r-dcm packages?
[{{< fa flag-checkered >}} Get started](start/index.qmd) by learning what you need in `r english::words(length(list.dirs("start", recursive = FALSE)))` articles, starting with how to specify a model and ending with a beginning-to-end case study.
